It contains: - Personal biographical data (birth date, place of birth) - Physical characteristics (height, blood type, sex) - Individual photo and signature - Government-issued ID number - Official government seals and security features 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** This clearly fits CECRL: - Contains "IDENTIFICACION PERSONAL" and "CEDULA DE CIUDADANIA" - Has personal biographical data: birth date (11-OCT-1965), birth place (Chiquinquira, Boyaca) - Contains physical characteristics: height (1.71), blood type (O+), sex (M) - Includes individual photo and signature - Government-issued with official seals and security elements - Focuses on ONE individual person (Publio Roberto Sierra) 6. **CONFIDENCE VALIDATION** The document is a verified CECRL with comprehensive identifying information and no apparent discrepancies.
